mapper.update:
update GOODS_ACTUAL_QUANTITY${tableSuffix} set
QUANTITY_ = #{quantity, jdbcType=DOUBLE},
PRICE_ = #{price, jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TOTALPRICE_ = #{totalPrice, jdbcType=DOUBLE},
UNIT_ = #{unit, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESSSTATUS_ = #{businessStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER},
CONFIRMBY_ = #{confirmBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONFIRMTIME_ = #{confirmTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID_ = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

update GOODS_ACTUAL_QUANTITY${tableSuffix} set BUSINESSSTATUS_ = #{businessStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONFIRMBY_ = #{confirmBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFIRMTIME_ = #{confirmTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID_ = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select GOODSNODEID_ as nodeId, YEAR_ as year, MONTH_ as month, DAY_ as day, FULLDAY_ as fullday, sum(TOTALPRICE_) as cost from GOODS_ACTUAL_QUANTITY${tableSuffix} where TENANTID_ = #{tenantId} and YEAR_= #{year} and MONTH_ = #{month} and BUSINESSSTATUS_ = 9 group by GOODSNODEID_, YEAR_, MONTH_, DAY_, FULLDAY_ order by DAY_ asc, GOODSNODEID_ asc
